pullrequest.title: Highlighting of World Tree Items is fixed

content.raw:
I showed Steffi the code and she had 2 comments.

1. She would like to see highlighting for the Models and Lights when you click on them (currently Scene, Physics, the child models, and the child lights get highlighted, but not Models or Lights).

1. She would like the behavior of expandable elements to be uniform (currently single clicking on Models and Lights causes them to expand/collapse, while single clicking on a model with a subordinate link (eg. ground_plane) shows its properties but does not expand/collapse).
content.html:
I showed Steffi the code and she had 2 comments.

  1. She would like to see highlighting for the Models and Lights when you click on them (currently Scene, Physics, the child models, and the child lights get highlighted, but not Models or Lights).

  2. She would like the behavior of expandable elements to be uniform (currently single clicking on Models and Lights causes them to expand/collapse, while single clicking on a model with a subordinate link (eg. ground_plane) shows its properties but does not expand/collapse).
